description: Searches the PM knowledge base to answer interview preparation questions, explains frameworks, provides examples, and structures responses for easy retention.

example_response.answer: The comprehensive answer to the user's PM question
example_response.framework_name: Name of the PM framework or concept being explained
example_response.interview_tip: Specific tip for using this in an interview context
example_response.related_topics: Comma-separated list of related topics to explore
